titlestmt.titleproper: Golden, Colo. United Church of the Applewoods membership records, 1961-1971.
titlestmt.author: Zachary Bodnar

maintenanceevent.eventdescription: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Wednesday May 22, 2024 at 15:55

did.unittitle: Golden, Colo. United Church of the Applewoods membership records, 1961-1971.
did.abstract: The establishment date for the United Church of the Applewoods in Golden, Colorado, is unknown, though it existed in the late 1950s. In 1968, the church agreed to share the building with the Jefferson Unitarian Church and in 1973 the church building was given completely to the Unitarian Church, likely marking the formal dissolution of the United Church of the Applewoods. The collection contains a single ledger containing both vital records and membership records for the church.

corpname.part: United Church of the Applewoods (Golden, Colo.)

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is unrestricted and open to the public.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Items in this collection are subject to U.S. Copyright Law. It is the responsibility of the researcher to determine the copyright status of collection items and to secure any permissions necessary for their reproduction and publication. Requests for permission to publish material must be discussed with the archivist or librarian.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], in the Golden, Colo. United Church of the Applewoods membership records, 1961-1971, RG5502. The Congregational Library & Archives, Boston, MA.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Materials were donated to the Congregational Library & Archives by the Rocky Mountain Conference, August 2021; accession 2021-07.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed by Zachary Bodnar, May 2024, using Describing Archives: A Content Standard.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The establishment date for the United Church of the Applewoods in Golden, Colorado, is unknown. The church building was likely designed by Roger J. Easton and constructed in 1963, though a version of the church building may have been constructed in the late 1950s. In 1968, the church entered into an arrangement with the Jefferson Unitarian Church to share facilities. In 1973, the Jefferson Unitarian Church took over control of the property. It is likely that the United Church of the Applewoods dissolved between 1971 and 1973. The Jefferson Unitarian Church continues to serve the Golden community today and continues to worship in the same building.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains a ledger of vital records for the United Church of the Applewoods in Golden, Colorado. The ledger contains records of baptisms, marriages, and deaths. The ledger also contains membership records, such as lists of members admitted and members dismissed.

bibliography.head: Bibliography
bibliography.p: United Church of Applewoods, 14350 W. 32nd, Golden, Colorado, 1963, Box: 1, Folder: 35. Devon M. Carlson collection, COU:299. University of Colorado Boulder Libraries, Rare and Distinctive Collections.
Greer, Jane. "Colorado congregation enjoys increased space." UUWorld, March 17, 2015. https://www.uuworld.org/articles/colorado-congregation-grows-builds.
